content: **support the designer** if you like the design and would like to support my work you can buy me a coffee on my ko-fi site 1 **about the design** baby chalice blanket is a pattern for a beautiful and simple baby blanket or trolley blanket using an all over lace pattern the blanket has a garter stitch border which provides a frame for the chalice lace the strong lines of the lace pattern makes it suitable for both boys and girls the pattern contains two versions one where the lace pattern is given in a chart and one where the pattern is written in full the result is the same **sizes ** one size **final measurements** 65 x 85 cm **materials ** * 300 g peruvian highland wool from filcolana 100 m pr 50 g or 3 skeins sheperd worsted multi from lorna s laces 206 m pr 114 g * circular needle size 6 mm 80 cm * 2 markers 1 https //ko-fi com/karenslauger_lykkefanten
